I might as well post this now.
This is what I'd like you to look at for me.
The idea is that you can paste a book or a story and it will break it down into statements to save as a text file.
So generate a lorebook.

Problem is it needs to write it like this:

Example.

Example.

Example.

And not like this:

Example.
Example.
Example.

IT'S honestly driving me nuts
